posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
/r9k/ is an imageboard where there are no exact reposts.

1. If you attempt to post something unoriginal, it is not posted, and you are muted temporarily.
2. The time with which you are muted for doubles with each transgression.
3. Each mute time is 2^n in seconds where n is the number of times you have transgressed. So, your mute time doubles each time you fuck up.
4. Backlinks, eg >>1, are not viewed by the robot. So "lolwut" and ">>2 lolwut" are the same post, in the eyes of the robot.
5. Gibberish at the end of a post to force originality may result in mod intervention (no BLOX posts please).
6. Images are NOT included in the filter, only text.
7. Your mute count slowly decreases over time.
8. You cannot post a picture without text.
9. Unicode is blocked. Sorry, too many exploits (Cyrillic letters, etc).
10. Posts require a certain minimum amount of original content in order to be posted.
11. Post sane, real content, well thought out replies, and mutes are unlikely.
12. The original algorithm was designed by XKCD:
http://blag.xkcd.com/2008/01/14/robot9000-and-xkcd-signal-attacking-noise-in-chat/

>>71707191

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>71707191
I spent the first 2-3 years regularily trying to cut all of this out of my life. I would spend a few days just pretending like I never had a waifu, like this character meant nothing to me. Eventually, I would get this strong feeling, I'd miss them.
I was afraid of "waifu" and anime fans, and thought it was the way to spiral to degeneracy and a failed life. I thought, maybe I could just snap out of it and stop being like that, I thought there's no way I fell in love unironically.
Nowadays, when I think about giving up what I feel, it feels rude, and like so much work. I found a warm side to lean on, maybe in an unusual way and place, maybe it's very out-of-character for who I normally am, but it's real nonetheless. Every bone in my body hated the life I live right now, and my waifu managed to convince all of them otherwise, one after the other.
I might have lost a bit of my rationality on the way, and I don't want to sound cheesy, but I think it was worth it.

>>71749215
>Would you rather invite your husbando/waifu on a date, or would you rather have your waifu/husbando invite you?
She'd typically be the one to invite me on dates. Usually by saying "Oh we don't have class on [x day], so let's go on a date! Honestly, I like it like that. Her assertiveness is good.
>Where would you two go?
If it's up to us, always a theme park. No matter whether it's close or far. It's my autistic interest, and she likes to have fun there, so it's a pretty great date choice for us.
>What'd you do there?
Well ride some rides obviously. But also we'd take some time to soak in some detail, the atmosphere in general, and just relax. The good ones have lots of hidden details which we love.
>What'd you two wear?
On our recent vacation she wore a different outfit for each day. Typically she likes to wear her usual clothes, since they already look pretty, but if it's a really special date she will get a dress on, which looks equally nice.
>When is the date?
Usually just whenever we're able. She also likes to do "tactical dates" where she instantly plans one whenever I'm in a rut of feeling like shit. Usually it helps at least a bit. Regarding having special events soon, I suppose my birthday is in a few weeks, and we might do something special for that. We'll see.
>Is there something you'd like to gift them while you're on a date?
No, not really. Gifts are for gifting time. We'd rather be doing things together on a date than giving each other items - the memories are their own gifts. She does have some interest in getting some, though.

>>71754802
>i'm not well-versed in the world of sonic, but i always enjoy reading your posts about shadow nevertheless since they're always aglow with pure, untiring passion
Thank you a bunch anon. It's really nice to know someone appreciates them. He means so much to me.
>what are your thoughts on his portrayal in the ps2 game named after him? i once had a friend who told me that it ruined his character
Here's a TL;DR.
Well, Shadow's game was kind of an...exception, writing/character wise.
See, from 2001 - 2009, Shadow was almost always written by Shiro Maekawa, who created the character. Maekawa is responsible for the best portrayals of Shadow bar none and nearly everyone agrees.
Shadow's game, however, was written by Takashi Iizuka (current head of Sonic Team). Iizuka also had a part in creating Shadow. Shadow, when written by Iizuka, is characterized differently than when written by Maekawa.
In my honest opinion, Iizuka's Shadow is boring. Something about him, it's just not as appealing, like they removed some of the depth. He's just "serious: the character". There's hardly any of that cute snark and pompous almost poetic disposition. The voice change didn't help, it was Griffith's first time voicing Shadow in a game and so came off as flat. And that's just the JP version too.
Now the English dub of the game? Where he's all like, "This is like taking candy from a baby, which is fine by me"? Now THAT leaves a bad taste in my mouth. You want to know why? Because not only was this flanderized edgy stuff not in the original, but it ruined Shadow's perception among the general public FOREVER. He's a JOKE to them. I get asked if I love Shadow ironically. Hehe funny edgy edgehog says edgy lines and cocks a SMG, takes candy from babies, damn damn damn
And this ruined perception wormed its way into the actual games. As Shadow is written now, he proves these people right.
Maekawa is gone and so is the Shadow everyone loved so much. It always hurts.

I find racism perfectly concordant with my psychedelic experiences and philosophical studies. Separation may be an illusion and part of a universal unity in a false universe where all consciousnesses have the potential to rise and fall away from enlightenment, but it's still a part of this material universe. After psychedelics I find myself kinder and more empathic to trannies, niggers, leftists and even jews as my brothers, deceived and misguided and doing their best from their own perspective, yet still believe some lifeforms are closer to enlightenment than others as they experience reincarnation. And how could I know the truth of this universal system and judge myself as closer to enlightenment? The more I try to get it, the more I realize the importance of the physical world. Maybe the darkie stealing bikes and beating up people is more enlightened than the insecure upper class redditor defending his actions because he is more in tune with this physical realm and his desires and needs in it. Tiger and dragon and all that.

I can't tell if following biological instinct to distrust difference is a good idea or not, but the instinct is there for a reason - because it represents uncertainty and danger which can absolutely fuck you and your loved ones up in the material world. For this reason I am racist, it is perfectly rational to be so. Maybe love is the one true liberator of minds to lead a good life and transcend, or just the demiurge's most heinous barrier to keep us trapped in this dream, hard to tell. I wouldn't say it's made me less racist, but it's made me appreciate my experiences with the real world more and appreciate less the divisive idpols twitter would spew at you. And it turns out those experiences tell me to be racist.

tl;dr, No, Im just more comfortable with being racist.

I agree.but the hyperactivity that's atypical of a 5 year old boy never went away for me. I don't believe in giving children adhd meds because there's no point apart from managing potentially extreme behavioural issues. not only did the hyperactivity remain, but the loss of concentration, motivation, organisation, impulse control, short term memory, ability to socialise all massively increased. and no I didn't grow up stuck to a TV or playing vidya or on a computer unsupervised. I grew up in the countryside and spent a lot of time outside. As I got older and the all the above negatives effects started happening I just withdrew from everything and stayed in my room reading and listening to music. I didn't start an internet addiction until I was about 13 by which point I had been aware of symptoms for years. If had been given meds at that point my life would be completely different now. I wouldn't have spent my entire not really doing anything. I had every opportunity given to me to succeed except parents that did not believe adhd wasn't real. it wasn't until I was 21 and several years deep into frequent drug use that I worked out I had adhd. only now am I being prescribed meds and its made me realise how much of my life has passed by without achieving anything whilst watching my friends and siblings continue to succeed. even now with stimulants I just don't have the motivation to catch up with people my age. I dropped out of uni twice because I can't even focus on things I'm interested in. Ihave been given such a huge setback in life that it just feels like there's no point in trying anything. It fucks me off so much to think it my life could be completely different had my parents believed in it at the time

Hello, Anon, need some help? A shoulder to cry on? Sit down and let's have a little chat.

STEP #1, HYGIENE AND HOME:
Brush your teeth twice a day, morning and evening. Scrub'em good with all the movements you can think of, circles, up and down, lateral, front and behind. This will take somewhere around 2 minutes. Floss once a day.
Moisturize your face with a cream after washing your face in the morning.
Depending on how much you sweat shower every or every second day.
Get a haircut every 2 months. If you are balding just cut'em short, anything else looks shit and insecure about it.
If your clothes are ripped, stretched and discolored as shit, get some new ones. Basic, monotone, cheap shirts will do just fine. Again, depending on your sweat wear'em between 1 and 3 days, then change. If you got a pile of dirty rags wash it.

This brings us to your home. Doesn't matter if you live alone or with your parents, clean your dwelling once a week. Empty bottles and packages are to be thrown away immediately, instead of hoarded. It's no work if you do it this way. Used plates, glasses, etc., are to be washed off immediately after use. Again, if you do it like this, it's way less work than cleaning off a whole pile of them.
Changing bed sheets and vacuuming the place once a week.

A healthy mind lives in a clean body, living in a clean place. All that grime on yourself and around you poisons your mind. This regime gets rid of that without too much effort. You will also feel a sense of accomplishment, which boosts you for what comes next, LEAVING THE HOUSE

STEP #2, LEAVE HOUSE:
Go out every day. Do long walks of atleast 2 hours. Explore your city, your surroundings. Go into alleys you never walked before. Whenever you think, oh whats there or I never was there or anything similiat, thats where you go!
Do not ask yourself shit, like "whats the use? Enjoy the moment, do not drown out your surrounsings with your depressive thoughts.

DUDU

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
STEP #3, SOCIALIZE:
I want you to greet people on your walks. Not some barely audible mumble, but a clear greeting. Establish eye contact, throw'em a good day coupled with a nod or a quick wave. I want your face to glow and your voice to echoe joy when you do this. Doesnt matter if its forced and unnatural at first, its training, if it came natural to you we wouldn't have to have this conversation.

After a few weeks or months of doing everything I told you, you should feel better about yourself. You wont be chad, fucking bitches left and right and going through life constantly happy, but at leaat you wont feel absolutely miserable for once. You may be able to pull off more intense forms of socializing now.

Get into the habit of doing smalltalk with strangers, like cashiers or the people you meet on walks. It doesn't matter that it's benign and trivial shit, just do it. Observe them, what they wear, their hair, makeup, tatoos, whatever and throw them a compliment, ask them where they got it from, what meaning it holds to them. When the convo naturally found its end, say your goodbye and go on your way.

STEP #4, GET A REAL HOBBY:
You should be prepared now, physically and mentally, to go out there and take the risk of trying new stuff, which will include meeting people doing the same stuff, but you are ready for that.

Here are things I can vouche for: Bouldering/climbing, martial arts, swimming, biking, skating, going to a chess/go/shogi/mahjong/etc center where you can watch, learn and play. If you like reading, go to a library instead of doing it at home. Generally, I advise you to engage mind and body. Try several physical activities and intellectual/creative ones.

At this point it should become a self perpetuating cycle. Keep challenging yourself, keep experiencing,exploring and learning new things.
Learn to "live in the moment". Dont question the use or meaning, do not rationalize, try to let the stimuli wash over you like a river.

DUDU

>>71761809

Hello, HomuraAnon. I was already asleep when you posted, hopefully you find your way back.

I am not quite sure if you need an answer to your question or if it was a rhetorical question. I'll answer anyway.

Having bonds with peoole that genuinely care about you and reach out to you would help tremendously. But, going by experience this isn't the case for most people here. They either never had anyone like that to begin with, which is another cause of their brokenness to begin with, or, if they had someone, they became estranged from them when thungs took a turn for the worse, which again made the situation even worse.

And once you are alone and fucked uo, noone will care about you. No waifu angel will appear from heaven to sqve you from your lonely, dark pit.
So the only way out is to claw your way back. And I cant say it enough, it is not about reacheing the place at the sun that already exists, it is the proesss of clawing your way away from the darkness that will make you a different person, that will inevitably change you for the better and thus create the place at the sun. You kinda forge the good place that doesn't yet exist by running into the unknown.

And once you do this for some time (around a year) you should start to feel less shit. And at some point you'll feel good enough about yourself, secure in your skin, with a firmly established personality that you'll be able to draw ppls attention, befriend them, maybe get a girl.

The hardewt part is to get going. As you said you do not enjoy anything, so why do it? This is the inertia you have to overcome. Like a car starting up. Normal people have kicked into higher gears since their childhood, but anyone with depression has to repeat that process of building momentum once again in adulthood.

Build habits, force yourself to do stuff regularly. Start with the basics I laid out, if you do not do that yet. Keep it up, make them a habit and slowly add more things to the roster.

well you can follow them. they might follow you just for that. but you can also send them asks, either with your name or anonymously. not everyone has asks turned on but most do.

you can just compliment them or their blog, or you can ask for some music recommendations, or video game recommendations, or ask "ootd?" which means "outfit of the day?" and its basically an excuse for them to post a selfie. and then if they answer your anon question, you can "like" the answer, thats kind of a hint that you were the asker.

another common thing is for people to reblog these sort of like "send me asks" posts where it'll have an image with like 20 numbered questions about some subject, or just random quirky questions. and then you just send like, "#1" in an anon ask to ask her that question. this is great because when people reblog these posts where they're asking for asks, it means theyre feelin lonely and looking for interaction. they also might ask for feedback on an outfit or whatever, or they might ask if anyone knows any good music or movies.

the best thing though really is just to be blogging along for yourself, and then you can interact with any chicks that come and follow *you.* being mutuals, that is you both follow each other, is like being friends on other platforms.

there is also a chat feature but what i like about tumblr is that people dont really use it. i dont really like texting or instant messaging, i find it really stressful, especially with strangers. so i like the slow pace of tumblr where you might send a few people asks and then over the next few days they might respond to them and you can see where things go at your own pace.

posts.com: There is no satan. Only heaven and hell. Temptation is a voice in your head that wants you to die alone in a cold, cold pit, in the dark, separate. Animals live in existence and die alone. So when you think of satan think of every evil thought your weakness led you to, every time you gave in to useless things and transient pleasure. The only truth on earth is what you build with your own two hands from the mud and filth. The only virtues were constructed by men in opposition to our base nature. Satan is a cope for weak men. Strength and virtue bring you close to the ideal man, adam kadmon, and to the divine nature. So be strong instead of weak. And its hard, and its natural to want to believe you were tempted and that there is a great enemy out there in the dark, who wishes you to fail and to suffer. The truth is that you construct prisons of suffering as easily as you build a world of beauty and beautiful things.

>>71767416
Just because one group of hateful incels is too stupid to pick up on the subtle misogyny of another dosen't mean it's not there. The criticism in these usually boils down to details that suggest these characters are:
>entitled (thus the pretty princess points)
>exploiting either their fathers or incels (when a male wojak appears at all)
>obsessed with chad, sexually promiscuous, or both (details like used condoms or dildos)
>mentally ill (bottles of medication, weird little shrines, etc.)
>gross and unhygienic (all the poo and pee, old food lying around)
On their own any of these elements could be a realistic depiction of a specific person or an affectionate self-parody, but only someone deeply seeped in incel seeethe and cope would think to include most or all of them. My best guess is that it's part of this morbid fascination with NEET/hikki/mentally ill girls because they're more attainable than normal, healthy girls, the same idiocy that drives people to keep looking for love on this board and discord even after being ghosted again and again.

>>71767720
>Most girls start bleeding at ages where pregnancy/birth would most likely severely disfigure or kill them
Pseudoscientific amerikike nonsense. Young pregnancies are perfectly healthy. Nothing better could happen to a 12 year old girl than falling pregnant.

Perry, R. et al (1996). "Pregnancy in early adolescence: Are there obstetric risks?," Journal of Maternal-Fetal Medicine, Volume 5, 1996 - Issue 6.

"The purpose of this study was to determine if early adolescence imparts a significant obstetric risk in young primiparas relative to adult primiparas. The records of 239 young primiparas (< 16 years) and 148 older primiparas (18-29 years) were reviewed for demographic information, antepartum complications, mode of delivery, length of labor, episiotomy, lacerations, birthweight, and length of gestation. [...] The incidence of most antenatal complications (chronic hypertension, pregnancy-induced hypertension, placental abruption, placenta previa, premature rupture of the membranes, urinary tract infections, and anemia) were similar between the two groups. Preterm labor and contracted pelvis were more common among the young adolescent, while gestational diabetes was less common. The young primiparas were significantly (P <. 05) less likely to have a Cesarean delivery and to lacerate with vaginal delivery. The length of labor and its stages were similar, as were overall birthweight and length of gestation. Thus, obstetric concerns regarding pregnancy in early adolescence may be unfounded. With the exception of an increased risk for preterm labor, it appears that pregnancy, labor, and delivery do not pose inordinate obstetric and medical risk to the very young adolescent primipara."

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>71767720
Wrong. Most girls of sufficient body fat (ie, not african skellys or extreme athletes) will have menarche at 12 (this hasn't significantly changed even as other parts of puberty have trended younger). At this age, pregnancy and childbirth won't be much more harmful than later.
HOWEVER, it does generally take a few menstrual cycles for the whole system to get regulated, sometimes even a whole year. And of course with all the hormones and growth spurts and such, it probably is better for girls to wait until that business is done.
Of course, society doesn't care much for biology, one way or the other, they'll still marry off kids at 12 or 18 or whatever else they feel like. For pretty much every society I can think of, marriage age was whenever the education was done - education meaning "what one needed to know to properly perform their roles in their family as mother/father". Tended that girls finished their educations sooner, since they both generally had less to learn, and their education started sooner than boys', so they'd marry younger.
